author: cnbc.com
title: Domo Named to CRN’s 2018 Big Data 100 List
text:
SILICON SLOPES, Utah, May 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Domo ® , the cloud-based operating system for business, announced that CRN ® , a brand of The Channel Company , has named Domo to its 2018 Big Data 100 list. This annual list recognizes the ingenuity of tech suppliers bringing to market innovative offerings for harnessing the increasingly large amounts of data generated in today’s digital world, raising the bar for data management and challenging established IT practices.
For the sixth annual Big Data 100 list, the CRN editorial team identified the IT vendors at the forefront of data management, business analytics, and infrastructure technologies and services that help solve this challenge. The resulting Big Data 100 list is a valuable guide for solution providers seeking out key big data technology suppliers.
Built as a cloud-first solution, Domo is designed to transform the way business is managed by making data from across the company accessible and actionable on any smartphone or any mobile device. With Domo, everyone from the CEO to the frontline worker is empowered to discover previously unseen opportunities and make timely decisions for the good of the company. By inspiring a more engaged and connected organization, Domo unlocks the value of your business data, giving you the power to get things done.
“The IT community is now able to collect massive volumes of valuable data—a veritable treasure trove of information for growing businesses,” said Bob Skelley, CEO of The Channel Company. “But reaping the benefits of these huge information streams is a complex and delicate process requiring expertise in data capture, storage, organization, tiering, security and analysis. The vendors on CRN’s 2018 Big Data 100 list have demonstrated an exceptional ability to help solution providers and their customers tackle this enormous project. The innovative products and services they have brought to market enable companies to not only manage large amounts of data, but to extract real value from it.”
The list was divided into four categories which include Business Analytics, Data Management Technologies, Big Data Platforms and Data Protection and Security Analytics. Domo was listed under Business Analytics for its ability to develop innovative technology to capture, integrate, manage and analyze increasingly huge volumes of data to derive value for businesses. To view the full 2018 Big Data 100 list, visit www.crn.com/bigdata100 .
About Domo
Domo’s mission is to be the operating system for business, digitally connecting all your data, your systems and your people, empowering them to collaborate better, make better decisions and be more efficient, right from their phones. Domo works with many of the world’s leading and most progressive brands across multiple industries including retail, media and entertainment, manufacturing, finance and more. For more information, visit www.domo.com . You can also follow Domo on Twitter , Facebook and LinkedIn .
About The Channel Company
The Channel Company enables breakthrough IT channel performance with our dominant media, engaging events, expert consulting and education, and innovative marketing services and platforms. As the channel catalyst, we connect and empower technology suppliers, solution providers and end users. Backed by more than 30 years of unequaled channel experience, we draw from our deep knowledge to envision innovative new solutions for ever-evolving challenges in the technology marketplace. www.thechannelco.com
